titles.title: A bill to provide that the effectiveness requirements of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act shall not apply to laetrile in certain cases.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exempt the use of laetrile for the treatment of pain under the direction of a physician from the effectiveness requirements of such Act.
